newsitem.title: FINLAND: Helsinki down in scant trade, Nokia bucks trend.
newsitem.headline: Helsinki down in scant trade, Nokia bucks trend.

text.p: Shares eased in thin trade on Thursday, with no clear direction from international markets still beset with jitters over this weekend's French elections, brokers said.
With a general lack of demand across Europe, brokers said the market had little impetus to turn upwards.
Nokia bucked the soft trend, gaining 1.00 markka to 347.00 in fair 50 million markka volume, and accounting for almost a third of total bourse turnover.
Just after reporting a narrower four-month loss, Amer rose 3.00 markka to 102.00 in 12 million markka volume.
